name: Release of v0.8.12
body:
## Bug Fixes
- panics when calling `BlockSlice` #127

name: Release of v0.8.11
body:
## Bug Fix
- bump reactor-go to v0.5.5: fix deadlock when using switch_if_error

name: Release of v0.7.12
body:
## Others
- bump reactor-go to latest version.

name: Release of v0.8.10
body:
## Improvements
- use `sync.Map` in duplex connection instead of custom map with lock.

name: Release of v0.8.9
body:
## Bug Fix
- compatible with go1.18+

name: Release of v0.8.8
body:
## Bug Fix
- support cancel respond channel

name: Release of v0.8.7
body:
## Bug Fix
- cancel request-channel

name: Release v0.8.6
body:
## Features
- add `GetAddr` which can be used to get the net address info from an existing rsocket connection.

name: Release v0.8.5
body:
# BugFix
- compile failed on ARM 32bits

name: Release v0.8.4
body:
# Bug Fix
- Check nil when send large payload. #111 
- Check nil when dial websocket. #109

name: Release v0.8.3
body:
# Improvement
 - Add HTTP code when dial Websocket failed. #108

name: Release v0.8.2
body:
## BugFix
* [REQUEST-CHANNEL]: fix deadlock in some cases. #106

name: Release v0.8.1
body:
## New Features:
* #103 [Websocket]: Adds support for Proxy function specified by the user.

name: Release v0.8.0
body:
# Changes
* The `Acceptor` for server/client supports context which passed from `Serve`/`Start`.

# Bug Fix
* `Context` will be passed to responder subscriber correctly.

name: Release v0.7.11
body:
# Bug Fix
* Fix goroutine leak: socket will be destroyed when connect successfully, but setup failed.

name: Release v0.7.10
body:
### Features
* mono: Support `ZipWith` operator.

### Improvement
* mono: reimplement `Zip` operator.

name: Release v0.7.9
body:
### Bug fix
* process panic recover correctly

### Other
* Bump reactor-go to v0.4.5

name: Release v0.7.8
body:
### Bug fix
* dead request with empty response.

### Other
* Bump reactor-go to v0.4.4.

name: Release v0.7.7
body:
### Other
* Bump reactor-go to v0.4.3

name: Release v0.7.6
body:
### Improvement
* More friendly panic handling

name: Release v0.7.5
body:
### New Features
* You can customize the request/response schedulers.

### Tuning
* Transport now will use multiple read loops.

name: Release v0.7.4
body:
### Improvement
* support new mono processor implementation

name: Release v0.7.3
body:
### New Feature
* Add `Len` for balancer which returns the amount of sockets in it.

name: Release v0.7.2
body:
### Bug fix
* event loop blocked when `OnNext` cost too much time. (workaround)

name: Release v0.7.1
body:
### New Features
* [rx/mono]: support zip/delay operations.

### Others
* Bump reactor-go to v0.4.0.

name: Release v0.7.0
body:
## New Feature
* Add `SwitchIfError` and `SwitchValueIfError` for mono API.

name: Release v0.7.0-beta.5
body: * Bump reactor-go to v0.3.5.

name: Release v0.7.0-beta.4
body:
* [BUGFIX]: fix byte buffer pool leak.
* [IMPROVE]: use pool for some writable frames.

name: Release v0.7.0-beta.3
body:
* Add mono.BlockUnsafe.
* Reduce mem usage.

name: Release v0.7.0-beta.2
body:
* Fix pooled frame chaos.
* Use `bytes.Buffer`(no 3rd dependency) instead of `valyala/bytebufferpool`.
* Bump reactor-go to v0.3.2.

name: Release v0.7.0-beta.1
body: * Add one shot API for Mono.

name: Release v0.7.0-alpha
body:
* Bring back `bytebuffpool` to reduce memory allocation.
* Upgrade dependencies.

name: Release v0.6.5
body: * [IMPROVE] Add client instance to `OnConnect` function #73

name: Release v0.6.4
body: * support connect and request timeout support.

name: Release v0.6.3
body:
* [BUGFIX] process incoming response frame correctly when the original request has been cancelled.
* Bump reactor-go to v0.2.5.

name: Release v0.6.2
body: * Compatible with Go1.11+

name: Release v0.6.1
body: Support context for connect and request.

name: Release v0.6.0
body:
* Reduce memory usage.
* Add error returning for next/map operators.
* Add transport builder instead of connect string.
* More unit tests.
* Improve coverage.
* Move framing/transport into `core` package, now you can implement your own transport.

name: Release v0.5.13
body:
**BUGFIX**
- ISSUE #59: now clients without acceptor will be processed correctly.

name: Release v0.5.12
body: BugFix for ISSUE #58 :  Upgrade `reactor-go` to version 0.1.3.

name: Release v0.5.11
body: Support use defined error. ( ISSUE #55 )

name: Release v0.5.10
Release v0.5.9
body: Fix CompositeMetadata.

name: Release v0.5.8
body: Bugfix: fix FireAndForget typo.

name: Release v0.5.7
body:
Support RSocket Authentication extension.
see: https://github.com/rsocket/rsocket/blob/master/Extensions/Security/Authentication.md

name: Release v0.5.6
body: Upgrade `github.com/urfave/cli` to v2.

name: Release v0.5.5
body: [BUGFIX]: cannot install rsocket-cli by 'go get github.com/rsocket/rsocket-go/cmd/rsocket-cli'. (see https://github.com/urfave/cli/issues/459)

name: Release v0.5.4
body: Bugfix.

name: Support Websocket CORS by env.
body:
Now you can control Websocket CORS by env below:
```shell
RSOCKET_WS_CORS=on/off
```

name: Release v0.5.0 alpha.
body: Add basic LEASE implementation.

name: Release v0.4.0
body:
- API CHANGE:
  - ServerAcceptor now return `(RSocket, error)`.
  - Now you can specify some options for transport. (eg: you can set http headers for websocket transport.)
- Upgrade some dependencies.
- Fix some bugs

1. A new reactive-streams implementation.
2. Support TLS.
3. Performance tuning.

> NOTICE: Some rx APIs has been changed.

name: support unix socket
body:
1. Support unix socket.
2. Func server.Serve now need a Context.
3. Move logger from internal to top package.

name: Add Resume support.
new feature: client-side load balancer.
Support new feature: fragmentation.
body:
Here are examples for setting fragment MTU.

```go
// for Server
rsocket.Receive().Fragment(128)
// for Client
rsocket.Connect().Fragment(128)
```

default fragment MTU is 16777215-3 (max uint24 - 3)
